definition: extreme joy turns to sorrow (idiom); Don't celebrate too soon, things could still go wrong!
happy/cheerful/to laugh
music
surname Le
surname Yue
extremely/pole (geography, physics)/utmost/top
to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student
sad/sadness/sorrow/grief

sentences.english: Am I Am I retarded or am I just overjoyed?
sentences.chinese: 我是智力遲鈍，還是樂極生悲呢？

sentences.english: Try new things and avoid getting too addict to your computer.
sentences.chinese: 嘗試新事物，避免樂極生悲吸毒者到您的計算機。

sentences.english: I have a sense something bad will happen.
sentences.chinese: 我有一種樂極生悲的感覺。

sentences.english: We seek happiness, but too much of it leads to sorrow.
sentences.chinese: 快樂，是人之所求，但太樂則樂極生悲。

definition: Trouble issues from the mouth (idiom). A loose tongue may cause a lot of trouble.

to have a clear view of things/to adapt to circumstances

lit. if thrown on the floor, it will make a sound (idiom)/fig. (of one's words) powerful and resonating/to have substance
having given away a bride, to lose one's army on top of it (idiom)/to suffer a double loss after trying to trick the enemy
